PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 3 Recently , significant progress has been made in the photovoltaic application of novel low - bandgap polymers with optical absorption wavelengths in the range of 700-900 nm.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. "photovoltaic application" - This is a property of the novel low-bandgap polymers, which refers to their ability to convert light into electrical energy using a solar cell.
2. "novel low-bandgap polymers" - This is a property of the polymers, which refers to their low bandgap energy, typically in the range of 700-900 nm.
3. "optical absorption wavelengths" - This is a property of the polymers, which refers to the range of wavelengths of light that they can absorb.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

1. "low-bandgap polymers" - This is a material property, as it refers to the energy range of the polymers' bandgap.
2. "700-900 nm" - This is a material property, as it refers to the specific wavelength range of light that the polymers can absorb.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low-bandgap polymers |
| 700-900 nm |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
